LABEL: 0xE41F
STRING: Slam!

LABEL: 0xE435
STRING: They disappeared behind the door after raising a flag that couldn't be any clearer.

LABEL: 0xE481
STRING: Left behind in the lobby were Hiragino and me.

LABEL: 0xE4B3
STRING: Overwhelmed by the violently high tension, we stood there in silence.

LABEL: 0xE519
STRING: ...This is awkward.

LABEL: 0xE535
STRING: Gotta think of a topic...

LABEL: 0xE557
STRING: Is there anything...?

LABEL: 0xE591
STRING: 「They sure are getting along well...」

LABEL: 0xE5C5
STRING: What I managed to squeeze out was incredibly mundane.

LABEL: 0xE60B
STRING: There was no way to follow up with this.

LABEL: 0xE641
STRING: I despaired at my own lack of wit and drowned it out with a fake laugh.

LABEL: 0xE6FB
STRING: 「Hmm.」

LABEL: 0xE716
STRING: However, Hiragino nodded as if remembering something.

LABEL: 0xE7BC
STRING: 「...You're right.」

LABEL: 0xE7DA
STRING: 「It's been a long time since I've seen her looking that happy.」

LABEL: 0xE827
STRING: He said so slowly, biting through his words.

LABEL: 0xE871
STRING: "Her"――

LABEL: 0xE88D
STRING: He must be talking about Yukari.

LABEL: 0xE8BB
STRING: They might not always seem to be on the best terms, but in reality, they looked to be quite close.

LABEL: 0xE913
STRING: ――Hiragino Sousuke and Momoi Yukari.

LABEL: 0xE937
STRING: You could tell from their exchanges that they were old acquaintances, but how well did they actually know each other?

LABEL: 0xE993
STRING: ...Not that it was any of my business, but I couldn't help but be curious.

LABEL: 0xE9E5
STRING: 「Hey, Hiragino-san?」

LABEL: 0xEA05
STRING: 「What's your relationship with Yukari-san?」

LABEL: 0xEA9F
STRING: 「Nothing much. We're just colleagues.」

LABEL: 0xEAC3
STRING: 「Just because we work at the same place doesn't mean we have a relationship.」

LABEL: 0xEB0A
STRING: The fact that he could say that so smoothly without thinking was, on the contrary, suspicious...

LABEL: 0xEB5C
STRING: But that was just me guessing.

LABEL: 0xEB9E
STRING: Nevertheless, after seeing their clashes yesterday, I didn't buy that nothing was going on between them.

LABEL: 0xEC04
STRING: You could say it was like a lover's quarrel... But even so, they had been biting into each other so much.

LABEL: 0xEC5E
STRING: Well, maybe they had some work-related problems in the past or something.

LABEL: 0xECAC
STRING: I'd be lying if I said I wasn't interested, but I was not going to pursue something he had no intention of talking about.

LABEL: 0xED08
STRING: In any case, the communication system would be restored in a few hours, and we could say goodbye to this closed-off submarine.

LABEL: 0xED72
STRING: When I thought that our fellowship would only last for a few more hours at most, my curiosity died down.

LABEL: 0xEDC8
STRING: I sat down on the sofa, bored.

LABEL: 0xEF40
STRING: 「Since breakfast isn't ready yet...」

LABEL: 0xEFD3
STRING: 「Maybe I'll do some radio exercises.」

LABEL: 0xEFFE
STRING: He had to be joking.

LABEL: 0xF016
STRING: Or so I briefly thought.

LABEL: 0xF052
STRING: Hiragino, with a very serious look on his face, hung up his coat for ease of movement.

LABEL: 0xF0A4
STRING: Was he serious?

LABEL: 0xF0CC
STRING: For real?

LABEL: 0xF0E8
STRING: 「Even if you want to do the exercises, we don't have the all-important radio.」

LABEL: 0xF126
STRING: 「We can't even play music...」

LABEL: 0xF1BC
STRING: 「In that case...」

LABEL: 0xF1DA
STRING: 「Hey, POL!」

LABEL: 0xF1FC
STRING: Hiragino approached a microphone attached to a pillar.

LABEL: 0xF241
STRING: 「POL, Radio Exercise No. 2.」

LABEL: 0xF26B
STRING: Just what was he asking POL, the world's leading artificial intelligence, to do?

LABEL: 0xF2B6
STRING: I wondered if POL-san had ever received such a trivial order before.

LABEL: 0xF305
STRING: 【Understood.】

LABEL: 0xF327
STRING: With that, a familiar and refreshing voice rang out from the speakers.

LABEL: 0xF381
STRING: As expected, I guess.

LABEL: 0xF39D
STRING: ...Stick to a single job, would you?

LABEL: 0xF493
STRING: 【...One, two, three, four.】

LABEL: 0xF4BF
STRING: 「Five, six, seven, eight.」

LABEL: 0xF599
STRING: 【Swing your arms lightly to the side and up!】

LABEL: 0xF5D6
STRING: 「Five, six, seven, eight!」

LABEL: 0xF60A
STRING: 「One, two――」

LABEL: 0xF626
STRING: In the middle of a lobby inside a not-so-spacious submarine――

LABEL: 0xF65E
STRING: ――Why were we two grown men jumping on one leg to the tune of Radio Exercise No.2?

LABEL: 0xF6BA
STRING: ...Aah, it makes me sad just thinking about it.

LABEL: 0xF74B
STRING: 「I bet the people who came up with the idea of radio exercises didn't think it would last until this day and age.」

LABEL: 0xF7B2
STRING: 「It's like kids these days think "radio" is a person's name.」

LABEL: 0xF7F7
STRING: 「Maybe it's because of the generation gap...」

LABEL: 0xF829
STRING: I wasn't sure if I should be acting like a grown-up in my early twenties...

LABEL: 0xF86D
STRING: Even Hiragino and I were years apart in age.

LABEL: 0xF8C3
STRING: As I turned my upper body, I peeked at his tired face.

LABEL: 0xF903
STRING: He was older than he dressed.

LABEL: 0xF9A7
STRING: 「Hm? What's wrong?」

LABEL: 0xF9CC
STRING: 「Nah, it's nothing.」

LABEL: 0xF9F7
STRING: 「Hmm?」

LABEL: 0xFA30
STRING: With that, Hiragino returned his attention to the exercises again.

LABEL: 0xFA6A
STRING: ...Hmm.

LABEL: 0xFA8A
STRING: If he were a cute girl, this would be a passable intro to a romance story.

LABEL: 0xFADC
STRING: But having this kind of an exchange with an old man... I guess there was nothing to it.

LABEL: 0xFB1A
STRING: 【Straighten up and take a deep breath.】

LABEL: 0xFB50
STRING: 「Haaah...」

LABEL: 0xFB6A
STRING: A sigh leaked out, mixed in with my deep breath.

LABEL: 0xFB96
STRING: It was another 40 minutes later that the door to the kitchen and/or crew room opened.

LABEL: 0xFE25
STRING: 「We're done!」

LABEL: 0xFE4E
STRING: ...That took a while.

LABEL: 0xFE70
STRING: I was getting rather hungry thanks to all the radio exercises we did.

LABEL: 0xFF84
STRING: When I turned toward the cheerful voice, I was met with Yukari and Tokiwa with a plate in each hand.

LABEL: 0xFFEE
STRING: A girl serving a home-cooked meal was such a wonderful sight.

LABEL: 0x1003A
STRING: Even if it was Tokiwa carrying it, the food looked delicious.

LABEL: 0x100B2
STRING: Just look at that bright blue color――

LABEL: 0x10120
STRING: Blue?

LABEL: 0x10132
STRING: Umm, on the plate...

LABEL: 0x1014E
STRING: What was on top was...

LABEL: 0x10174
STRING: Something blue on a level that didn't exist in nature.

LABEL: 0x101B6
STRING: What was that thing?

LABEL: 0x101D6
STRING: 「Hiragino-san...」

LABEL: 0x10260
STRING: 「лл-kun...」

LABEL: 0x10283
STRING: An unpleasant sweat formed on my forehead.

LABEL: 0x102A3
STRING: The air conditioning should still be in perfect condition, so what was this?

LABEL: 0x102E9
STRING: A glimpse of a mysterious power that transcended science...

LABEL: 0x1034C
STRING: 「Go ahead and enjoy your meal!」

LABEL: 0x1037B
STRING: I found myself staring at the brightly-colored dishes(?) lined up before me.

LABEL: 0x103C5
STRING: Some of them emitted a miasma mixed with steam.

LABEL: 0x10403
STRING: I had no idea how they managed to produce something like this...

LABEL: 0x10443
STRING: But there was no doubt that they were going to kill us.

LABEL: 0x1058F
STRING: As evidence of that, the girls who had finished serving the food were reluctant to take their seats.

LABEL: 0x105D1
STRING: 「Oh, are we the only ones eating?」

LABEL: 0x10626
STRING: 「I ended up snacking a lot.」

LABEL: 0x10652
STRING: 「So I'm already full.」

LABEL: 0x1067D
STRING: What the――

LABEL: 0x1069B
STRING: I wouldn't call it snacking if you did it until you were full...

LABEL: 0x106D9
STRING: And these plates laid out in front of us...

LABEL: 0x10748
STRING: 「...This... is quite a lot, isn't it?」

LABEL: 0x1076A
STRING: It was too much for the two of us to eat.

LABEL: 0x10812
STRING: 「Well, you see... Uh...」

LABEL: 0x108A0
STRING: 「We did our best.」

LABEL: 0x108CE
STRING: 「This is the result of adjusting all the ingredients to the best possible ratio.」

LABEL: 0x10977
STRING: 「So it's nothing to be ashamed of!」

LABEL: 0x109AF
STRING: What a bold excuse!

LABEL: 0x109D5
STRING: Touri opened her mouth somewhat apologetically.

LABEL: 0x10A71
STRING: 「If you can't finish it, you can just leave it.」

LABEL: 0x10B0D
STRING: 「No.」

LABEL: 0x10B27
STRING: 「You can't waste food!」

LABEL: 0x10BBF
STRING: 「But, you know...」

LABEL: 0x10BEC
STRING: 「No means no.」

LABEL: 0x10C17
STRING: Tokiwa repeated herself with a stout expression.

LABEL: 0x10C55
STRING: It looked like she was serious about not wasting any food.

LABEL: 0x10D51
STRING: 「Yes, that's right.」

LABEL: 0x10DCC
STRING: 「As a man, you would never leave a woman's home-cooked food behind, would you?」

LABEL: 0x10E29
STRING: 「――Of course not.」

LABEL: 0x10E68
STRING: Hiragino... You're a true man.

LABEL: 0x10E8E
STRING: And I, too, had resolved myself.

LABEL: 0x10EC2
STRING: I stared at the bubbling-blue something in front of me.

LABEL: 0x10EF0
STRING: Gulp.

LABEL: 0x10F06
STRING: That sound had nothing to do with appetite.

LABEL: 0x10FA0
STRING: 「Well then, let's dig in, лл-kun.」

LABEL: 0x10FCF
STRING: 「...Ah, yeah...」

LABEL: 0x11007
STRING: 『Itadakimasu.』

LABEL: 0x11109
STRING: Then, 30 minutes later.

LABEL: 0x11125
STRING: We managed to finish our meal.

LABEL: 0x1114D
STRING: In case you were wondering, it had looked like a mess, and the taste was... Uhh...

LABEL: 0x1119B
STRING: ...At least the ladies seemed to enjoy themselves from start to finish.

LABEL: 0x11235
STRING: 「Well then, please clean up after yourselves.」

LABEL: 0x11270
STRING: I knew it would turn out this way.

LABEL: 0x1129A
STRING: We didn't have a choice, naturally...

LABEL: 0x112EB
STRING: 「Yeah... Got it...」

LABEL: 0x11316
STRING: Hiragino staggered but managed to stand up while supporting his head.

LABEL: 0x11356
STRING: Leave it... to me... No, it was no use.

LABEL: 0x11380
STRING: 「Sorry, Hiragino-san..」

LABEL: 0x11418
STRING: 「It's all right.」

LABEL: 0x11430
STRING: 「Even at a time like this... I'm a doctor.」

LABEL: 0x11463
STRING: His words had mysterious persuasiveness to them.

LABEL: 0x1147D
STRING: What kind of hell had this man been through?

LABEL: 0x114DB
STRING: He wandered over toward the kitchen, and I watched his large back disappear through the doorway.

LABEL: 0x115A9
STRING: 「Uoooooohh――!」

LABEL: 0x115CD
STRING: I covered my ears.

LABEL: 0x115ED
STRING: I didn't hear it.

LABEL: 0x11607
STRING: I didn't hear anything.

LABEL: 0x11625
STRING: Hiragino... I'm sorry...!

LABEL: 0x116B3
STRING: 「Oh, yeah.」

LABEL: 0x1172C
STRING: 「I have to bring some of this to Reiri.」

LABEL: 0x11763
STRING: What a scary thing to say.

LABEL: 0x117A3
STRING: Touri was impatiently putting together the dishes.

LABEL: 0x117D3
STRING: Was she going to kill her sister with her own two hands?!

LABEL: 0x1180B
STRING: I had to do something――!

LABEL: 0x1182D
STRING: 「No, let me take it.」

LABEL: 0x118C1
STRING: 「Huh? Why?」

LABEL: 0x118E4
STRING: I turned my head to look at Touri, and our eyes met.

LABEL: 0x11918
STRING: She stared at me curiously.

LABEL: 0x11942
STRING: 「Because... I'm free right now?」

LABEL: 0x119CE
STRING: 「Let's go together then. I mean, don't you have more work to do afterward, лл-san?」

LABEL: 0x11A87
STRING: 「Or, is there some other reason?」

LABEL: 0x11ABA
STRING: Well...

LABEL: 0x11AD2
STRING: That was correct...

LABEL: 0x11AEE
STRING: 「What would you think if you woke up and your sister was bringing you food all of a sudden?」

LABEL: Split3
STRING: 「If it were me, I'd feel sorry and embarrassed. I wouldn't be able to eat because I'd have too many questions for her.」

LABEL: 0x11BB0
STRING: 「If I were in her position, I don't think I could refuse to eat if a complete stranger was the one bringing the food. I'd have no choice but to eat.」

LABEL: Split6
STRING: 「I believe she'll think the same way.」

LABEL: 0x11C74
STRING: 「Yeah, you should totally leave it to me. Think about it from her perspective. Let's do that.」

LABEL: 0x11CEA
STRING: 「...So, in other words, I'll be taking the food to her.」

LABEL: 0x11D50
STRING: Touri let out a voice, bewildered.

LABEL: 0x11D8A
STRING: My ability to confuse people seemed to be getting better and better...

LABEL: 0x11E30
STRING: 「Well, whatever. I'll leave it to you!」

LABEL: 0x11EB7
STRING: 「Ah, right...!」

LABEL: 0x11EDF
STRING: Saying that, Touri gave me a plastic container.

LABEL: 0x11F8D
STRING: 「While you're at it, take these to her too!」

LABEL: 0x11FBE
STRING: It made a rattling sound when she shook it.

LABEL: 0x11FE2
STRING: What's inside? Medicine?

LABEL: 0x1200A
STRING: 「Got it. I'll give those to her.」

LABEL: 0x12048
STRING: I took the medicine and held the plate.

LABEL: 0x12074
STRING: Secretly, I snuck in a packet of still-unused healthy food from a cardboard box under the plate.

LABEL: 0x120DE
STRING: Sorry, Touri... I bowed my head in my heart.

LABEL: 0x12110
STRING: This is all for your sister's sake.

LABEL: 0x12136
STRING: I couldn't believe she was going to make her eat that grotesque food when she was sick...

LABEL: 0x1217E
STRING: I absolutely couldn't allow that!

LABEL: 0x121B2
STRING: I stood up, plate in hand.

LABEL: 0x121DC
STRING: Behind me, I could hear the others enjoying themselves.

LABEL: 0x122EB
STRING: 「Now then...」

LABEL: 0x12307
STRING: Armed with medicine, a plate, and a packet of instant food, I went to the room where I had spent last night.

LABEL: 0x12353
STRING: Reiri should have woken up by now, right?

LABEL: 0x12389
STRING: I opened the door by holding up my keycard.

LABEL: 0x123B7
STRING: 「Excuse me...」

LABEL: 0x1242E
STRING: The room was dark.

LABEL: 0x12446
STRING: Were the lights not on?

LABEL: 0x1246C
STRING: 「POL, lights.」

LABEL: 0x124E6
STRING: The room lit up in response to my voice.

LABEL: 0x1250A
STRING: The brightly lit room was like it was before I left.

LABEL: 0x1254E
STRING: From the furnishings to the luggage and the girl sleeping in the bunk bed.

LABEL: 0x12586
STRING: 「Hey!」

LABEL: 0x125B8
STRING: I called out to her and shook her lightly.

LABEL: 0x125DE
STRING: No response.

LABEL: 0x125F8
STRING: But her body was warm, she had a pulse, and I could hear her breathing.

LABEL: 0x1263A
STRING: How much sleep did this girl need? Well, whatever...

LABEL: 0x1267C
STRING: 「Eat this when you wake up.」

LABEL: 0x1269C
STRING: I put down the food and medicine I had brought on the desk and left the room.
